item.title: Add Httpic
item.description: https://httpic.com - Turn any website into jpg, png or pdf. Capture full page screenshots, adjust viewport, inject custom code. Free tier at 150 images / month.

item.title: Add Hookdeck
item.description: https://hookdeck.com/pricing - Develop, test and monitor your webhooks from a single place. 100K requests and 100K attempts per month with 3 days retention.

item.title: Update landing page
item.description: https://en.pingcap.com/tidb-cloud/ - — TiDB is an open source MySQL compatible distributed HTAP RDBMS. TiDB Cloud provides one-year free Developer Tier, 500 MiB of OLTP storage, and 500 MiB of OLAP Storage.

item.title: Update TiDB Cloud according to it's latest offering
item.description: https://tidbcloud.com/free-trial - — TiDB is an open source MySQL compatible distributed HTAP RDBMS. TiDB Cloud provides one-year free Developer Tier, 500 MiB of OLTP storage, and 500 MiB of OLAP Storage.

item.title: comments from MR
item.description: https://jotcode.io - A serverless platform for hosting simple scripts, API and servers. Free plan allows running 100 scripts per month

item.title: add jotcode
item.description: https://jotcode.io - A serverless platform for hosting simple scripts, API and servers

item.title: Add sslip.io DNS service
item.description: https://sslip.io/ - Free DNS service that when queried with a hostname with an embedded IP address returns that IP address.

item.title: Update bit.io
item.description: https://bit.io) — Managed PostgreSQL database service. 1 database, 10GB storage, 1 CPU and 1GB Memory (burst - Managed PostgreSQL database service. 1 database, 10GB storage, 1 CPU and 1GB Memory (burst).

item.title: Move Argonautfrom PaaS to CI/CD
item.description: https://argonaut.dev/ - Deploy apps and infrastructure on your cloud in minutes. Support for custom and third-party app deployments on Kubernetes and Lambda environments. Free tier allows unlimited apps and deployments for 5 environments and 2 users.

item.title: Add Tebi
item.description: https://tebi.io/ - S3 compatibility object storage.Free 25 GB storage and 250GB outbound transfer.
